column1: Population:                          In the context of hypothesis testing for stock price prediction, the historical and future stock prices of Nvidia would be be the population.

column2: Stock price of Nvidia taken from 27th Nov - 29th Dec 2023
H0 : There is no significant difference in performance of linear regression models Model_A and Model_B.
Ha : Model B Outperforms than Model A  --> One tailed Test
T-test  <  Critical Value. ------>> We reject the null hypothesis stating that there is no signifcance difference in performance of linear regression models.

The alternative hypothesis is supported, suggesting that Model B performs better than Model A. 
Implying that incorporating "Low" and "Volume" variables into the linear regression model resulted in improved performance.
Implying that incorporating "Low" and "Volume" variables into the linear regression model resulted in improved performance.
